verses.verse: At <S%H2063>this<s%> also my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2729>trembleth<s%>, and is moved <S%H5425>out<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H8085>attentively<s%> the <S%H7267>noise<s%> of his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and the <S%H1899>sound<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>. Hear: Heb. Hear in hearing

He <S%H3474>directeth<s%> <S%H8281>it<s%> under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and his <S%H216>lightning<s%> unto the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>. lightning: Heb. light ends: Heb. wings

<S%H310>After<s%> it a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7580>roareth<s%>: he <S%H7481>thundereth<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1347>excellency<s%>; and he will not <S%H6117>stay<s%> them when his <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
<S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7481>thundereth<s%> <S%H6381>marvellously<s%> with his <S%H6963>voice<s%>; great <S%H1419>things<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> he, which we cannot <S%H3045>comprehend<s%>.

For he <S%H559>saith<s%> to the <S%H7950>snow<s%>, Be <S%H1933>thou<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>; likewise to the <S%H4306>small<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>, and to the <S%H4306>great<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> of his <S%H5797>strength<s%>. likewise: Heb. and to the shower of rain, and to the showers of rain of his strength
He sealeth <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H120>man<s%>; that all <S%H582>men<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H4639>work<s%>.
Then the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H1119>into<s%> <S%H695>dens<s%>, and <S%H7931>remain<s%> in their <S%H4585>places<s%>.
Out of the <S%H2315>south<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>: and <S%H7135>cold<s%> out of the <S%H4215>north<s%>. south: Heb. chamber north: Heb. scattering winds
By the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7140>frost<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%>: and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> is <S%H4164>straitened<s%>.
Also by <S%H7377>watering<s%> he <S%H2959>wearieth<s%> the thick <S%H5645>cloud<s%>: he <S%H6327>scattereth<s%> his <S%H216>bright<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%>: his: Heb. the cloud of his light

And it is <S%H2015>turned<s%> round <S%H4524>about<s%> by his <S%H8458>counsels<s%>: that they may <S%H6467>do<s%> whatsoever he <S%H6680>commandeth<s%> them upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He causeth it to <S%H4672>come<s%>, whether for <S%H7626>correction<s%>, or for his <S%H776>land<s%>, or for <S%H2617>mercy<s%>. correction: Heb. a rod
<S%H238>Hearken<s%> unto this, O <S%H347>Job<s%>: stand <S%H5975>still<s%>, and <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works of <S%H410>God<s%>.
Dost thou <S%H3045>know<s%> when <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7760>disposed<s%> them, and caused the <S%H216>light<s%> of his <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3313>shine<s%>?
Dost thou <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4657>balancings<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, the wondrous <S%H4652>works<s%> of him which is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in <S%H1843>knowledge<s%>?
How thy <S%H899>garments<s%> are <S%H2525>warm<s%>, when he <S%H8252>quieteth<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by the <S%H1864>south<s%> wind?
Hast thou with him spread <S%H7554>out<s%> the <S%H7834>sky<s%>, which is <S%H2389>strong<s%>, and as a <S%H3332>molten<s%> looking <S%H7209>glass<s%>?
<S%H3045>Teach<s%> us what we shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto him; for we cannot <S%H6186>order<s%> our speech by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
Shall it be <S%H5608>told<s%> him that I <S%H1696>speak<s%>? if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%>, surely he shall be swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%>.
And now men <S%H7200>see<s%> not the <S%H925>bright<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> which is in the <S%H7834>clouds<s%>: but the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5674>passeth<s%>, and <S%H2891>cleanseth<s%> them.
Fair <S%H2091>weather<s%> <S%H857>cometh<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%>: with <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H1935>majesty<s%>. Fair: Heb. Gold

Touching the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, we cannot find him <S%H4672>out<s%>: he is <S%H7689>excellent<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>, and in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and in <S%H7230>plenty<s%> of <S%H6666>justice<s%>: he will not <S%H6031>afflict<s%>.
<S%H582>Men<s%> do therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> him: he <S%H7200>respecteth<s%> not any that are <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
